title: The John Dory's Lawrence Welk Recipe
full_text:
The John Dory's Lawrence Welk Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Ice
1/2
ounce
freshly squeezed
lime juice
Dash Regans'
orange bitters
3/4
ounce
aperol
3/4
ounce
Dolin
sweet vermouth
1 1/2
ounces
blanco
tequila
Directions
Fill cocktail shaker with ice, add lime juice, bitters, Aperol, sweet vermouth, and tequila. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve immediately.
Special equipment
cocktail shaker and strainer
Tequila
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
